Question: List the names of users who reviewed businesses located in 'Springfield' and rated them 5 stars?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name="Springfield" AND review.stars=5
RETURN user, wrote, review, reviews, business, inCity, city, user.name
Rewrite: Provide the names of users who assessed businesses in 'Springfield' with a 5-star rating.

Question: What are the categories of businesses that have photos with embeddings suggesting a similarity score greater than 0.9?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE label.score > 0.9
MATCH (business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
RETURN business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, inCategory, category, category.name

Question: Can you show the addresses and names of businesses that have reviews written on '1st January 2021' with more than 4 stars?
Cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)-[wroteReview:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
WHERE review.date = date("2021-01-01") AND review.stars > 4
RETURN review, wroteReview, business, business.name, business.address
Rewrite: Could you display the names and addresses of companies that received reviews on '1st January 2021' with a rating above 4 stars?

Question: What are the descriptions of labels associated with photos having a partition value of 5 and located in businesses within the city of 'Las Vegas'?
Cypher:
MATCH (city:City {name: "Las Vegas"})<-[inCity:IN_CITY]-(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE photo.partition = 5
RETURN city, inCity, business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, label.description
Rewrite: What are the descriptions of labels linked to photos that have a partition value of 5 and are situated in businesses in 'Las Vegas'?

Question: Identify all business names that have been reviewed by users who are also authors of a tip with more than 100 likes.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]->(business:Business), (user)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business)
WHERE wroteTip.likes > 100
RETURN user, wroteReview, review, reviewed, business, wroteTip, business.name
Rewrite: List all companies that have received reviews from users who have also written a tip that garnered over 100 likes.

Question: Which cities contain businesses that have been reviewed by 'John Doe' and have photos depicting 'elegant ambiance'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {name:"John Doe"})-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE label.description="elegant ambiance"
RETURN user, wrote, review, reviews, business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, inCity, city, city.name
Rewrite: In which cities are there businesses reviewed by 'John Doe' that also feature photos showing 'elegant ambiance'?

Question: What are the scores of the HAS_LABEL relations for photos with captions containing 'mountain view' in businesses categorized as 'Outdoor Activities'?
Cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (business:Business)-[categorized:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE photo.caption CONTAINS "mountain view" AND category.name = "Outdoor Activities"
RETURN photo, hasLabel, label, business, categorized, category, hasLabel.score
Rewrite: What are the ratings for the HAS_LABEL relations in images with captions that include 'mountain view' from businesses classified under 'Outdoor Activities'?

Question: Can you find the relationship scores between users who are friends and have a similarity score greater than 0.75 on reviews of businesses in the 'Restaurant' category?
Cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(user2:User)-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user1)
WHERE similarity.score > 0.75
MATCH (user1)-[wrote1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[reviews1:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE category.name = "Restaurant"
MATCH (user2)-[wrote2:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[reviews2:REVIEWS]->(business)
RETURN user1, user2, friendship, similarity, wrote1, review1, reviews1, wrote2, review2, reviews2, business, inCategory, category, similarity.score
Semantic-EQL-Question: What are the interactions and reviews shared between users who are friends and have a similarity score above 0.75 for businesses categorized under restaurants?
Rewrite: Could you determine the relationship scores for users who are friends and possess a similarity score above 0.75 when reviewing businesses categorized under 'Restaurant'?

Question: Retrieve the date and text attributes from the tip-writing relations for a user named 'Emily' who wrote tips for businesses with at least 10 reviews.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {name:"Emily"})-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]->(review:Review)
WITH user, wroteTip, business, COUNT(review) AS reviewCount
WHERE reviewCount >= 10
RETURN user, wroteTip, business, wroteTip.date, wroteTip.text
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User {name:"Emily"})-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)
WITH user, wroteTip, business, COUNT(review) AS reviewCount
WHERE reviewCount >= 10
RETURN reviewed, review, user, wroteTip, business, wroteTip.date, wroteTip.text

Question: List the 'score' attributes of SIMILAR relations where both users have given a review on the same business and rated it differently by 2 stars or more.
Cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[similar:SIMILAR]->(user2:User)
MATCH (user1)-[wroteReview1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[forBusiness1:REVIEWS]->(business:Business),
      (user2)-[wroteReview2:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[forBusiness2:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE ABS(review1.stars - review2.stars) >= 2
RETURN user1, similar, user2, wroteReview1, review1, forBusiness1, business, forBusiness2, review2, wroteReview2, similar.score
Rewrite: Provide the 'score' attributes from SIMILAR relationships where each user involved has reviewed the same business and their ratings differ by at least 2 stars.

Question: What are the average scores of the HAS_LABEL relation for all photos in a business under the category 'Hotels' with a minimum rating of 4 stars?
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category), (business)-[:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (review:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE category.name="Hotels" AND review.stars >= 4
RETURN business, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, AVG(hasLabel.score)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category), (business)-[relation6:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (review:Review)-[relation8:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE category.name="Hotels" AND review.stars >= 4
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, business, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, AVG(hasLabel.score)
Rewrite: What are the mean scores for the HAS_LABEL relation across all images in a business listed under the 'Hotels' category that have at least a 4-star rating?

Question: Detail the scores of IN_CATEGORY relationships where the business has a state address in 'California' and offers 'Spa services'.
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE business.state = "California" AND category.name = "Spa services"
RETURN business, inCategory, category
Rewrite: List the ratings for IN_CATEGORY relationships where the enterprise is located in 'California' and provides 'Spa services'.

Question: Calculate the average number of reviews written by users who have photos attached to their reviews for businesses located in 'New York City'.
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "New York City"
WITH user, COUNT(review) AS reviewsCount
MATCH (user)-[:WROTE]->(:Review)-[revToPhoto:REVIEWS]->(:Business)-[:HAS_PHOTO]->(:Photo)
RETURN AVG(reviewsCount)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "New York City"
WITH user, COUNT(review) AS reviewsCount
MATCH (user)-[relation10:WROTE]->(node4:Review)-[revToPhoto:REVIEWS]->(node5:Business)-[relation12:HAS_PHOTO]->(node6:Photo)
RETURN AVG(reviewsCount)
Semantic-EQL-Question: For users who reviewed businesses in "New York City," what is the average number of reviews they each wrote?
Rewrite: Determine the mean count of reviews authored by users with photos included in their reviews for enterprises situated in 'New York City'.

Question: Provide the maximum, minimum, and average scores in HAS_LABEL relations for photos tagged at businesses with more than 50 reviews.
Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(review:Review)
WITH business, COUNT(review) AS totalReviews
WHERE totalReviews > 50
MATCH (business)-[:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN MAX(hasLabel.score) AS MaximumScore, MIN(hasLabel.score) AS MinimumScore, AVG(hasLabel.score) AS AverageScore
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[reviews:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)
WITH business, COUNT(review) AS totalReviews
WHERE totalReviews > 50
MATCH (business)-[relation5:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN MAX(hasLabel.score) AS MaximumScore, MIN(hasLabel.score) AS MinimumScore, AVG(hasLabel.score) AS AverageScore
Rewrite: Supply the highest, lowest, and mean scores in HAS_LABEL relations for photos associated with businesses that have over 50 reviews.

Question: What is the count of businesses reviewed by users who have written both reviews and tips for the same business and have ratings of either 1 or 5 stars?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]->(business:Business),
      (user)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business)
WHERE review.stars = 1 OR review.stars = 5
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT business)
Rewrite: How many businesses have been reviewed by users who have provided both reviews and tips for those businesses and whose ratings are either 1 or 5 stars?

Question: Can you calculate the total number of friendships where both users have reviewed the same business within the 'Tech Gadgets' category?
Cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]-(user2:User)
MATCH (user1)-[:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
MATCH (user2)-[:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business)
MATCH (business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Tech Gadgets"})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT friendship)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]-(user2:User)
MATCH (user1)-[relation7:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[relation10:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
MATCH (user2)-[relation8:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business)
MATCH (business)-[relation11:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Tech Gadgets"})
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT friendship)
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you tell me the number of distinct friendships among users who wrote reviews for the same business categorized under "Tech Gadgets"?
Rewrite: Could you compute the aggregate count of friendships in which both members have reviewed an identical establishment under the 'Tech Gadgets' category?

Question: Show the average, maximum and minimum similarity scores between users who are friends and have reviewed at least 3 common businesses.
Cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(user2:User)
MATCH (user1)-[wroteReview1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[reviewsBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)<-[reviewsBusiness2:REVIEWS]-(review2:Review)<-[wroteReview2:WROTE]-(user2)
WITH user1, user2, COUNT(DISTINCT business) AS commonBusinesses
MATCH (user1)-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user2)
WHERE commonBusinesses >= 3
RETURN AVG(similarity.score) AS averageSimilarity, MAX(similarity.score) AS maxSimilarity, MIN(similarity.score) AS minSimilarity
Semantic-EQL-Question: What is the average, maximum, and minimum similarity score between users who are friends and have reviewed at least three common businesses?
Rewrite: Display the average, maximum, and minimum similarity scores among friends who have each reviewed at least three mutual businesses.

Question: Find the average star rating of reviews linked to businesses that are in the 'Fast Food' category and have business photos taken in daytime.
Cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)-[:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE category.name="Fast Food"
MATCH (business)-[:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
WHERE photo.label="daytime"
RETURN AVG(review.stars)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)-[relation4:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE category.name="Fast Food"
MATCH (business)-[relation6:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
WHERE photo.label="daytime"
RETURN AVG(review.stars)
Rewrite: Calculate the mean star rating for reviews associated with 'Fast Food' category businesses that have daytime business photos.
